hero.title: Hello, I'm Faqih
hero.name: I'm a Full Stack Developer
hero.description: Blending 9 years of experience as an HR with Full Stack Development expertise. I help businesses digitally transform with innovative application solutions.

experience.description-1: Leading the development of scalable web applications using modern technologies. Mentoring junior developers and architecting solutions for complex business requirements.
experience.description-2: Developed and maintained multiple client projects, focusing on responsive design and performance optimization. Collaborated with design teams to implement pixel-perfect interfaces.
experience.description-3: Built responsive web applications and implemented modern UI/UX designs. Worked in an agile environment with rapid prototyping and iterative development.
experience.description-4: Started my professional journey developing websites and web applications. Learned best practices in coding, version control, and project management.
